Scout - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents a record in the Scouts table from the database
Scout() - Constructor for class Scout
Empty constructor as the variables will all be assigned using relevant setters
ScoutManager - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the main program for the Scout Manager project and creates the home screen which is first encountered by the user when application is started
ScoutManager(JFrame) - Constructor for class ScoutManager
This constructor will be called when the home button is pressed at any stage during the system.
setAddress(String[]) - Method in class Scout
Sets the address of the scout as an array with four lines
